post.title: New Treasured Antiques Gleam Giveaway - Enter Now & Get Great Skins
post.excerpt: Are you ready for the ultimate treasure hunt? The New Treasured Antiques Gleam giveaway is finally here and will be epic. Trust us, you don’t want to miss out on this one. All you have to do is enter the giveaway, do simple tasks, and cross your fing
post.content_html:
Are you ready for the ultimate treasure hunt? The New Treasured Antiques Gleam giveaway is finally here and will be epic. Trust us, you don’t want to miss out on this one. All you have to do is enter the giveaway, do simple tasks, and cross your fingers to win some loot. So let’s find out more about this fantastic opportunity.

In article you will find:

  • What’s New?
  • All info about Treasured Antiques Giveaway
  • AWP | Lightning Strike (FN)
  • Bayonet | Case Hardened (WW)
  • AK-47 | Case Hardened (FT)
  • M4A1-S | Dark Water (FT)
  • USP-S | Overgrowth (FT)
  • M4A4 | Modern Hunter (BS)
  • CS:GO Weapon Case
  • Wrapping Up!

What’s New?

Hellcase provides a rare chance to win legendary skins from the first CS:GO cases. So you will have the opportunity to touch on history. The Treasured Antiques giveaway will take place on May 26 – Jun 15, with 50 prizes for grabs. To enter the giveaway, click the “giveaway” button at the top of the Hellcase homepage. It’s that easy!

To participate in the Treasured Antiques giveaway, log in to the event page. Here, you can track when the giveaway is happening, see what tasks you need to complete, and monitor how many entries you have so far.

Each task has different values, with more challenging ones earning you more entries. Although winners are chosen randomly, having more entries increases your chances of winning.

If you need further assistance with Hellcase giveaways, check out our guide on Gleam Giveaways .

All info about Treasured Antiques giveaway

We’re giving away six types of excellent skins and twenty Weapon cases worth $3,285 to 50 lucky winners. So your odds of winning some amazing loot are pretty high!

But hurry because this giveaway is open on May 26 – Jun 15 until 9 AM GMT. So, enter immediately and try to win.

AWP | Lightning Strike (FN)

The first prize in our giveaway will be AWP | Lightning Strike , which you can get for free. The skin is a nice purple color with a large lightning bolt in its background. This weapon is versatile and can be used by terrorists and counter-terrorists, so don’t miss your chance and get your AWP | Lightning Strike in the giveaway from Hellcase.

Bayonet | Case Hardened (WW)

You can get the legendary Bayonet | Case Hardened from us for free as the next prize. This knife is just as versatile as the AWP, and it looks great no matter which side you’re on. Right now, it’s worth over $900, so make sure you take the chance to win it in our giveaway.

AK-47 | Case Hardened (FT)

Also, a winner can receive a valuable AK-47 | Case Hardened for free as part of the giveaway. It has a color scheme similar to the Bayonet | Case Hardened one. However, its multicolored spotted surface makes it stand out from other AK-47 skins.

M4A1-S | Dark Water (FT)

What about M4A1-S | Dark Water that – get it! – also comes for free? This time, we are offering M4A1-S skins in our giveaway. Seven lucky winners will receive an awesome M4A1-S skin with a restrained, stylish design highlighting the counter-terrorists serious mood.

USP-S | Overgrowth (FT)

Ten participants in our giveaway will receive USP-S | Overgrowth for free. This skin has a classic military camouflage pattern with splashes of yellow, black, and green that will look great in your collection.

M4A4 | Modern Hunter (BS)

Another ten winners will be selected to receive M4A4 | Modern Hunter free of charge for their collection, and all they have to do is participate in the giveaway. The M4A4 | Modern Hunter skin has an autumn military camouflage design, making it an ideal choice for players who like to play with M4A4.

CS:GO Weapon Case

The winners who will rank from place 31 to 50 will be awarded CS:GO Weapon case from Hellcase. So take advantage of the opportunity to get one for free. These cases contain valuable skins such as Desert Eagle | Hypnotic , AK-47 | Case Hardened, Glock-18 | Dragon Tattoo , and others you’ll want to add to your collection.

Wrapping Up!

New Treasured Antiques Gleam giveaway by Hellcase is an excellent opportunity for players to update their skins and enhance the game’s visual appeal for themselves and other players. This giveaway is worth considering, and we also recommend participating in other Hellcase giveaways. You could be one of the lucky winners and add some new treasures to your collection!
